item.title: Using Tox and PyTest with OpenFaaS
item.description: I think it is an uncontroversial statement that to say testing is important in software development. Writing tests may not always be fun, but nothing is a sweet as that moment when a unit test catches a bug before your commit. In OpenFaaS we have tons of tests in each project, even the certifier itself that runs a short suite of end-to-end tests. But, not all of our function templates have first class testing support.
